verses.plain: Paul and Timotheus, the servants of Jesus Christ, to all the saints in Christ Jesus which are at Philippi, with the bishops and deacons:

tokens.t: Paul and Timotheus, the servants of Jesus Christ, to all the saints in Christ Jesus which are at Philippi, with the bishops and deacons:

verses.plain: Grace be unto you, and peace, from God our Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ.

tokens.t: Grace
unto you, and peace, from God our Father, and
the Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.plain: I thank my God upon every remembrance of you,

tokens.t: I thank my God upon every remembrance of you,

verses.plain: Always in every prayer of mine for you all making request with joy,

tokens.t: Always in every prayer of mine for you all making request with joy,

verses.plain: For your fellowship in the gospel from the first day until now;

tokens.t: For your fellowship in the gospel from the first day until now;

verses.plain: Being confident of this very thing, that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ:

tokens.t: Being confident of this very thing, that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform
until the day of Jesus Christ:

verses.plain: Even as it is meet for me to think this of you all, because I have you in my heart; inasmuch as both in my bonds, and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel, ye all are partakers of my grace.

tokens.t: Even as it is meet for me to think this of you all, because I have you in my heart; inasmuch as both in my bonds, and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel, ye all are partakers of my grace.

verses.plain: For God is my record, how greatly I long after you all in the bowels of Jesus Christ.

tokens.t: For God is my record, how greatly I long after you all in the bowels of Jesus Christ.

verses.plain: And this I pray, that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and in all judgment;

tokens.t: And this I pray, that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and
all judgment;

verses.plain: That ye may approve things that are excellent; that ye may be sincere and without offence till the day of Christ;

tokens.t: That ye may approve things that are excellent; that ye may be sincere and without offence till the day of Christ;

verses.plain: Being filled with the fruits of righteousness, which are by Jesus Christ, unto the glory and praise of God.

tokens.t: Being filled with the fruits of righteousness, which are by Jesus Christ, unto the glory and praise of God.

verses.plain: But I would ye should understand, brethren, that the things which happened unto me have fallen out rather unto the furtherance of the gospel;

tokens.t: But I would ye should understand, brethren, that the things
unto me have fallen out rather unto the furtherance of the gospel;

verses.plain: So that my bonds in Christ are manifest in all the palace, and in all other places;

tokens.t: So that my bonds in Christ are manifest in all the palace, and in all other

verses.plain: And many of the brethren in the Lord, waxing confident by my bonds, are much more bold to speak the word without fear.

tokens.t: And many of the brethren in the Lord, waxing confident by my bonds, are much more bold to speak the word without fear.

verses.plain: Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife; and some also of good will:

tokens.t: Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife; and some also of good will:

verses.plain: The one preach Christ of contention, not sincerely, supposing to add affliction to my bonds:

tokens.t: The one preach Christ of contention, not sincerely, supposing to add affliction to my bonds:

verses.plain: But the other of love, knowing that I am set for the defence of the gospel.

tokens.t: But the other of love, knowing that I am set for the defence of the gospel.

verses.plain: What then? notwithstanding, every way, whether in pretence, or in truth, Christ is preached; and I therein do rejoice, yea, and will rejoice.

tokens.t: What then? notwithstanding, every way, whether in pretence, or in truth, Christ is preached; and I therein do rejoice, yea, and will rejoice.

verses.plain: For I know that this shall turn to my salvation through your prayer, and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ,

tokens.t: For I know that this shall turn to my salvation through your prayer, and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ,

verses.plain: According to my earnest expectation and my hope, that in nothing I shall be ashamed, but that with all boldness, as always, so now also Christ shall be magnified in my body, whether it be by life, or by death.

tokens.t: According to my earnest expectation and
hope, that in nothing I shall be ashamed, but
with all boldness, as always,
now also Christ shall be magnified in my body, whether
by life, or by death.

verses.plain: For to me to live is Christ, and to die is gain.

tokens.t: For to me to live
Christ, and to die
gain.

verses.plain: But if I live in the flesh, this is the fruit of my labour: yet what I shall choose I wot not.

tokens.t: But if I live in the flesh, this
the fruit of my labour: yet what I shall choose I wot not.

verses.plain: For I am in a strait betwixt two, having a desire to depart, and to be with Christ; which is far better:

tokens.t: For I am in a strait betwixt two, having a desire to depart, and to be with Christ; which is far better:

verses.plain: Nevertheless to abide in the flesh is more needful for you.

tokens.t: Nevertheless to abide in the flesh
more needful for you.

verses.plain: And having this confidence, I know that I shall abide and continue with you all for your furtherance and joy of faith;

tokens.t: And having this confidence, I know that I shall abide and continue with you all for your furtherance and joy of faith;

verses.plain: That your rejoicing may be more abundant in Jesus Christ for me by my coming to you again.

tokens.t: That your rejoicing may be more abundant in Jesus Christ for me by my coming to you again.

verses.plain: Only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ: that whether I come and see you, or else be absent, I may hear of your affairs, that ye stand fast in one spirit, with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel;

tokens.t: Only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ: that whether I come and see you, or else be absent, I may hear of your affairs, that ye stand fast in one spirit, with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel;

verses.plain: And in nothing terrified by your adversaries: which is to them an evident token of perdition, but to you of salvation, and that of God.

tokens.t: And in nothing terrified by your adversaries: which is to them an evident token of perdition, but to you of salvation, and that of God.

verses.plain: For unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ, not only to believe on him, but also to suffer for his sake;

tokens.t: For unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ, not only to believe on him, but also to suffer for his sake;

verses.plain: Having the same conflict which ye saw in me, and now hear to be in me.

tokens.t: Having the same conflict which ye saw in me, and now hear
in me.
